me siyalla adhikaranaya hamuwedi wisanda ganna lesa dambaulla mulasthana polis parikshaka saranath samarakon mahatha awasanaye owunta danum dunne ya.dambaulla sahakara polis adhikari kamal pushpakumara mahatha kiwe me kanthawage uthsahaya nisa me daruwa pilibanda thorathuru heli kara ganimata haki wu bawath daruwan pilibandawa mita wada demawupiyan salakillak dakwiya yuthu bawath ya.ambalangoda polisiyata me kanthawa kala paminilla anuwa sakapita athadanguwata gath sakakaru ha daruwa dambaulla wadabalana mahesthrath niluka wijerathna mahathmiya hamuwata idiripath kirimen pasuwa labana 13 dina dakwa bandhanagara gatha karana lesath edinata balapitiya mahesthrath adhikaranayata sakakaru idiripath karana lesath niyoga kala ya.
